    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Att skriva reaktionsformler</string>
            <string language="en">To type reaktionsformler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zum Typen reaktionsformler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Au type reaktionsformler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ao tipo reaktionsformler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">A tipo reaktionsformler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στον τύπο reaktionsformler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Al tipo reaktionsformler</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Experimentet då väte brinner i luft visas med en animation och förloppet beskrivs med ord.Ingår i Modul 3 - Kemi A.</string>
            <string language="en">The experiment then väte is on fire in air to be shown with one animation and the process is described with words.

Is included in module 3 - chemistry A.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">reaktionsformel</string>
            <string language="sv">vätgas</string>
            <string language="sv">syre</string>
            <string language="sv">vatten</string>
            <string language="sv">reaktion</string>
            <string language="sv">Kemi A</string>
            <string language="sv">kemi</string>
            <string language="en">reaktionsformel</string>
            <string language="en">vätgas</string>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
            <string language="en">waters</string>
            <string language="en">reaction</string>
            <string language="en">Chemistry A</string>
            <string language="en">chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Experiment dann väte ist auf Feuer in einer 
mit einer Animation gezeigt zu werden Luft, und der Prozeß wird mit 
words.Is beschrieben, das in Modul 3 - Chemie A eingeschlossen ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le väte d'expérience alors est sur le feu en air
à montrer avec une animation et le processus est décrit avec 
words.Is inclus dans le module 3 - la chimie A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O väte da experiência então está no fogo no ar
a ser mostrado com um animation e o processo é descrito com o 
words.Is incluído no módulo 3 - o chemistry A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il väte di esperimento allora è su fuoco in aria
da indicare con una animazione ed il processo è descritto con 
words.Is incluso in modulo 3 - chimica A.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πείραμα έπειτα vδte είναι στην πυρκαγιά στον 
αέρα που εμφανίζεται με μια ζωτικότητα και η διαδικασία 
περιγράφεται με τις λέξεις συμπεριλαμβάνεται στην ενότητα 3 - 
χημεία Α.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El väte del experimento entonces se arde en el 
aire que se mostrará con una animación y el proceso se describe con 
words.Is incluido en el módulo 3 - la química A.</string>
          </description>
